# Welcome

Welcome to a demo website that uses the [`quarto-webr`](https://github.com/coatless/quarto-webr) extension to generate interactive code cells with [Quarto](https://quarto.org) and [webR](https://docs.r-wasm.org/webr/latest/).

```{webr-r}
print("Hello there! Welcome to a quarto-webR powered website!")
```
